shopifyCollection.title: Pins
shopifyCollection.description: Boring hat, jacket, backpack, life? Trying to fill up your pin keeper? There are very few things that enamel pins can’t make better.
shopifyCollection.descriptionHtml: Boring hat, jacket, backpack, life? Trying to fill up your pin keeper? There are very few things that enamel pins can’t make better.

products.title: Impossible Unlikely Enamel Pin • Wilco x Oxford Pennant Original
products.description: These pins are part of a collection by Oxford Pennant for Wilco.
products.descriptionHtml: These pins are part of a collection by Oxford Pennant for Wilco.

products.title: Buffalo Enamel Pin • Lost Lust Supply x Oxford Pennant Original
products.description: Created in collaboration with our partners at Lost Lust, we created a uniquely Buffalo pin for any hat, jacket, backpack, or pin keeper.
products.descriptionHtml: Created in collaboration with our partners at Lost Lust, we created a uniquely Buffalo pin for any hat, jacket, backpack, or pin keeper.

products.title: Buffalo Button Pack • Oxford Pennant Original
products.description: td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;} A three-pack of buttons to show your Buffalo pride. Guaranteed to make your favorite jean jacket even cooler. Button sayings: Keep Buffalo A Secret; BUF; Let's Go Buffalo Size: 1.5" Color: Multi
products.descriptionHtml:
A three-pack of buttons to show your Buffalo pride. Guaranteed to make your favorite jean jacket even cooler.

Button sayings: Keep Buffalo A Secret; BUF; Let's Go Buffalo 

Size: 1.5"

Color: Multi

products.title: Yes You Can Enamel Pin • Kelle Hampton x Oxford Pennant Original
products.description: This item is part of a collaboration with Kelle Hampton, a New York Times Bestselling Author. Kelle’s book, Bloom, is a story about her relationship with her daughter Nella, who was born with Down syndrome. A portion of all proceeds benefit Ruby’s Rainbow, a charity who supports adults with Down syndrome seeking higher education.
products.descriptionHtml: This item is part of a collaboration with Kelle Hampton, a New York Times Bestselling Author. Kelle’s book, Bloom, is a story about her relationship with her daughter Nella, who was born with Down syndrome.  A portion of all proceeds benefit Ruby’s Rainbow, a charity who supports adults with Down syndrome seeking higher education.

products.title: Boooooring Enamel Pin
products.description: (Yawn) This enamel pin is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good. This design is also available as an embroidered patch. Size: 1.4" tall
products.descriptionHtml:
(Yawn)

This enamel pin is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good.

This design is also available as an embroidered patch.

Size: 1.4" tall

products.title: NO! Enamel Pin

This design is also available as an embroidered patch. Size: 1" tall
